content: Score some major brownie points with a loved one by showing them how much they mean to you with these personalized love story books. You’ll be able to customize everything from the story to the illustrations to make your unique fairy tale love story come to life.

Whether you’re looking to lug around all your textbooks or just want to discreetly sneak food into the movies, this giant Jansport backpack will get the job done. It features the iconic yet simplistic Jansport design and measures an impressive 55×42 inches.

Cut down your commute time by swapping your wheels for the Cobalt Valkyrie personal aircraft. Inspired by classic fighter jets, it’s powered by a twin-turbo piston engine capable of generating 350 HP and features an elegant design with first class accommodations.

Pedal into the future of cycling by equipping your ride with this smart cycling computer system. The streamlined design blends seamlessly with the bike and records data – such as calories burned, heart rate, and speed – while also acting as a navigation system.

Save yourself the unbearable pain and agony that only a stepped on LEGO brick can provide by walking around in these LEGO protector slippers. These limited edition slippers provide a comfy fit and feature a thick sole designed to shield your feet.

Take your next tattoo idea for a test drive before committing to it for a lifetime using these custom realistic temporary tattoos. Starting at just $15, you’ll be able to upload your chosen design and receive a wearable stencil you can use to test out your tattoo.

The 2-in-1 car portable charger is a must-have automotive accessory that functions as both a charger and portable battery. It plugs easily into the 12V slot on your car’s dashboard and includes both USB type A and the newer type C ports.

Make your goodies stand out from the rest of the pile under the tree by wrapping up your gifts with this drunk Santa wrapping paper. The hilarious image showcases jolly old St. Nick <del>projectile vomiting</del>  spreading holiday cheer all over the place.

Become a master of cured meats by using this jerky crafting kit. The kit comes with everything you’ll need in order to turn your favorite cuts of meat into gourmet jerky, like non-stick drying screens and two different kinds of spices.

Make your daily commute more efficient by traveling with the unfolding backpack electric skateboard. Designed to be worn, rolled, and ridden – it transitions between a backpack, skateboard, or carry-on style bag with enough room to carry you and all your gear.

Flood your body with adrenaline as you take to the air on this hydro jetboard. This insanely fun gadget sends you soaring into the air by pumping the water underneath you to thrust you upwards while you’re firmly attached to the foot harnesses.

Treat friends and family to a mental breakdown this holiday season by giving them this never ending musical Christmas card. Upon opening the card, they will be greeted to a delightfully unbearable Christmas tune that will never stop playing.

If the iconic Game Boy had just been created today, this sleek Game Boy 1Up is what it might look like. This concept system combines elements from the classic console and modernizes them to be compatible with today’s games.

It is said that whoever unleashes the wrath of the rubber band machine gun will henceforth wield unquestionable power over the schoolyard or office. With a 672 shot capacity, this fully automatic machine gun will have you feeling like a rubber band Rambo.

Take your mixology skills to the next level by concocting delicious creations with these laboratory shot glasses. Ideal for the alcoholic chemist who has it all, the set includes 2 beakers, a Florence flask, and Erlenmeyer flask shaped glasses.

Show off your holiday spirit this Christmas with these wearable ornaments for your beard! Each package includes ten multicolored baubles that you can easily attach to your face fuzz for an eye-catching look guaranteed to get laughs.

Get into the holiday spirit in geeky intergalactic fashion by slipping into one of these Star Wars ugly Christmas sweaters. Each 100% acrylic sweater comes adorned with a gloriously tacky Dark Side inspired design, such as Vader and the ominous Stormtroopers.

Maximize your driving experience by capturing every aspect of it using this data driven dash camera system. It features a sleekly designed camera, wheel mounted remote, and wireless adapter that connects to your car’s computer to relay real-time data.

Shame on a knitter who try to run outside without a scarf. If you’re an Ol’ Wooly Bastard who believes that “crafts rule everything around me”, then you need to protect ya neck this winter with this one of a kind Wu-Tang inspired scarf.

This season don’t just deck the halls, get your workstation looking more festive as well using this Christmas lights charging cable. Measuring forty-six inches long, the cable comes adorned with ten multicolored lights that glow as your device charges.

Stay warm in true wizard fashion by wrapping one of these Harry Potter house scarves around your frosty neck. Each lambswool garment features the colors and crest of one of the four houses at Hogwarts – Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, Slytherin, and Hufflepuff.

Turn any desk into the ideal place for a power nap during your next all-nighter by using these book pillows. Available in one of three classic texts, these fluffy pillows come filled with polyurethane foam and feature a quote from the story, printed on the back.

Skip the endless paperwork and purchase your new auto in record time using this coin operated car vending machine. Once you insert the over-sized coin into the slot, the robot operated vending machine hands you your ride in just 20 minutes.

Clean up the your town’s streets by patrolling them on this Batmobile go-kart. This one of a kind beauty has been fitted with a hand sculpted exterior and fiberglass casing so it looks identical to the Batman’s ride in Arkham Nights.

Step into the future of fashion by accenting your ensemble with the self-adjusting smart belt. Apart from keeping track of your overall health, the belt automatically adjusts itself during the day depending on how much you’ve eaten or exercised.

Live the 007 lifestyle by traveling through the open water in this James Bond Q boat. The boat uses a powerful 350 hp V12 Chevy “jet” engine that pumps water out at high pressure, eliminating the need for propellers.

Enjoy a mind bending game of billiards with the banana pool table. While this uniquely shaped pool table may not serve you well for practicing your pool shark skills, it’ll provide you and your friends with a fun alternative to this classic game.

Become the mother of dragons by placing this Drogon plushie on your shoulder. Apart from his ferocious teeth, he has a four foot wing span and features fully poseable limbs so you can arrange him any way you want.

Shock everyone at the drag strip when you show up in this 850 HP Toyota sleeper Camry. Though the exterior features a run-of-the-mill Camry design, this monster conceals a tube-frame dragster powered by a supercharged, nitro-huffing V-8 engine.

Stay organized with help from your favorite intergalactic droids by hanging this Star Wars droids magnet set up on the fridge. The magnets come styled like pint-sized versions of the BB-8 droid and the iconic R2-D2.

Keep your dentist busy by having a constant stream of sugar delivered direct to your doorstep with this monthly candy subscription. Rather than burn precious calories walking to the store, you’ll have the finest hard and gummy candies around brought straight to you.

Celebrate the festival of lights in twenty-first century fashion by lighting up the candles of this 8-Bit menorah. The entire menorah features a cool retro 8-Bit design and comes with a discreet button that allows you to easily light up the lamp.

Raw power meets portability in the design of this super shorty shotgun. Measuring just 16.5 inches long, this potent firearm holds 2-3/4″ or 3″ shells in the magazine, plus one in the chamber and features a pistol grip handle for added comfort.

For the low price of just 40 minerals you can construct additional pylons to power up your electronic devices on your desk. This officially licensed product comes with two USB ports and emits a cool blue glow as it charges your devices.

Give your patio a little timey whimey flair by adding to the landscape using this TARDIS light up lawn decoration. Standing a mighty thirty inches tall, the iconic TARDIS is internally illuminated to provide great accent lighting.

Step up your grooming game by swapping out that disposable razor for this vintage shaving kit. You’ll have everything from a top quality badger hair brush to a sleek heavy-weight chrome razor and after shave gel that provide a barber shop quality shave at home.

Type formal letters and projects up like a true millennial using this emoji keyboard. The keyboard is available in three different models containing 47 to over 120 different emojis so you can have entire conversations without saying a word.

Have a little fun with your dinner guests by messing with them after your delicious meal using these custom message fortune cookies. With each cookie you’ll be able to write a custom ninety character message that’s displayed on three rows.

Settle the debate once and for all – Han took the first shot. And the second. And the third. And the fourth, until he blacked out. And now you can recreate this iconic moment in intergalactic history using this Han Solo blaster flask.

Give your look some nautical flair by accenting it with this lovely octopus watch. Designed by master watchmaker Stefan Kudoke, this stunning 42mm skeleton frame watch displays an exquisitely intricate octopus intertwined along the watch’s inner workings.

Stay relevant by learning the lingo of the millennials with help from this “How To Speak Emoji” book. The book teaches you the ins and outs of this I.Q. dropping image based lingo so that you’ll be able to tell amazing and complex stories without saying a single word.

Become the undisputed king of the road when you get behind the wheel of this 1451 horsepower Hennessy Venom GT. Equipped with a monster twin turbo 7.0 liter engine, this exotic ride is capable of going 0-60 at a panty-dropping 2.4 seconds.

Shine a little light over the Dark Side of your room by using this quirky little BB-8 desk lamp. By simply tapping BB-8’s small head you can alter between three different lighting settings including natural white, amber, and warm white.

Help eliminate hazards on your next longboarding session with the skateboard wheel shields. The shields will improve the quality of your ride by protecting against wheel bite, increasing the life of the bearings and acting as a splash guard.

Instantly transform any regular board into a top of the line electric skateboard using this mountable electric skateboard system. The drive system replaces your rear wheels and truck with its two in-wheel motors, and comes with with a removable battery pack.

Ensure Mr. Meowington is equipped to fend off any evil that threatens his kingdom by suiting him up in this 3D printed cat armor. The armor is designed to cover your kitty’s entire backside and straps around the chest for utmost mobility.

titleEN: Old School Toys And Candy Crate
content: Kick stress to the curb by indulging in a bit of nostalgic fun with one of these old school toys and candy crates. Upon prying the crate open you’ll be greeted with tons of cool toys such as a Yomega yo-yo and slinky to delicious candy like Cracker Jacks and Pop Rocks.

Add a geeky touch of accent lighting to your room that any RPG fan would be proud to display using this LED potion desk lamp. This compact lamp comes half filled with liquid to resemble a potion and can alternate between four dynamic colors.

No one likes a home where ancient spirits make the walls ooze with blood – it’s just terrible for resale value. So before you buy, you should always run a background check to see if anyone’s died or committed a gruesome crime in your potential dream house.

Gain a deeper appreciation for the vastness of the universe by sitting inside this space constellations LED chair. With a sixties inspired spherical design, the interior comes embedded with dozens of LEDs that are programmed to simulate the stars in the night sky.

Pay homage to your favorite android superhero by staying warm in this Mega Man hoodie. Styled like the iconic blue suit, this garment features a 3D helmet design on the hood in addition to Mega Blaster lights printed on the left arm.

Take on any terrain mother nature throws your way riding atop this solar powered off road scooter. It features a sturdy steel frame, custom off-roading tires, and comes with a 500 watt motor that propels you at speeds of up to 16 miles per hour.

Have yourself a boozy little Christmas as you count down to the holidays using this craft beer advent calendar. Rather than settling for a chocolate or dinky toy, you’ll be rewarded to a refreshing hand-picked craft beer every single day.

See to it that your expensive equipment stays in prime condition while you’re on the go by keeping it inside this travel photography backpack. It features an internal bag divider to neatly pack a DSLR body and up to 8 lenses – or a similar combination of equipment.

Enjoy a steakhouse quality slab of meat from the comfort of your own kitchen by using this compact dry age steak box. It sits right inside your fridge and drives out the moisture of the meat, allowing the enzymes to tenderize it and oxidize the fat for an incredible flavor.

Fend off the cold by transforming your feet into beastly hooves using these giant monster slippers. Apart from being insanely comfortable, these one size fits all bootie style slippers make a stomping sound effect when you step.

Avoid carrying bulky containers everywhere by storing all the contents of your shake inside the ultimate gym shaker bottle. It opens from the bottom for easy clean up and features a small compartment designed to keep your protein separate until you’re ready to mix.

Make your campsite feel a little more like home by using this modular camping system. This portable system can accommodate anywhere from two to four people and can be used as either a dining room, bedroom, or bathroom.

Keep an ace up your sleeve if you’re suddenly faced with a survival situation by arming yourself with this multi-tool axe. It features a full tang S7 steel construction and incorporates a multitude of useful tools like a seatbelt cutter, pry bar, and hammer.

Effortlessly lock and unlock your two-wheeled ride as easily as you would your automobile, using this keyless bike lock. This high tech lock enables you to share its location and grant access remotely so that friends and family can borrow your bike anytime.

Stay ahead of your competition and keep your skills sharp using this ping pong soccer table game. The curved design allows two players to easily bounce the ball to one another in a way that puts technical skills, concentration, and stamina to the test.

Place a new spin on the classic game of billiards by swapping your standard table for this doughnut pool table. Apart from stimulating your senses with its drool-worthy design, the circular shape creates new and fun challenges for players used to straight edges.

Ensure you’re ready to tackle the mission at hand by arming yourself with these USMC elite blades before heading into the field. These tactical tools are forged from 440C stainless steel and feature CNC machined G-10 handles for an optimum grip.

Ensure the beach remains a crime-free zone by warding off bad guys with this Batman caped swimsuit. This one-piece suit is styled just like the Caped Crusader’s iconic uniform and features a detachable back cape that make this ideal for any geeky fangirl.

Give your Star Wars themed photo shoot a bit of authenticity by stationing one of the galaxies most notorious crime lords nearby using this inflatable Jabba the Hut. Once the Bloated One is fully inflated, he measures 10 feet long and lights up from within.

Ensure you’re prepared for your great outdoor adventure by bringing along this survival hiking stick. It comes jam packed with essential tools like a 300 lumen flashlight, waterproof matches, and over 50 feet of paracord.

Conduct a sting operation without arousing the target’s suspicion using this live streaming video camera pen. The pen features a pin-hole sized lens that captures high definition 720p video for up to 30 minutes of continuous use.

If you’re searching for a fun and geeky way to serve snacks to hungry guests, these Star Wars R2-D2 and C-3PO serving bowls are the droids you’ve been looking for. Each bowl measures 6.5 inches in diameter and is designed to hold up to 3-1/4th cups.

Ensure your adult grape juice remains unsoiled after its cherry has  been popped by sealing it back up with a wine condom. The cover easily slips over the mouth of the wine to create an airtight seal designed to prevent up to 99.97% of unplanned spillages.

Avoid getting lost in the wild when your GPS fails you by heading out with this steampunk wrist compass. This old school styled timepiece features a stunning brass compass and sundial combination to help pinpoint your location and the time of day.

Bring a touch of whimsy to your backyard with the addition of this wire fairy sculpture to the scenic landscape. This work of art is sculpted entirely from wire, making it ideal for outdoor use, and depicts a fanciful fairy flying about your yard.

Whether you’re driving through post-apocalyptic streets or just a bumpy shopping mall parking lot, you’ll get by with no problem while in the Jeep Wrangler Terminator. Powered by a heavy duty 6.4-liter Hemi V8, it also features 4.56 gears and improved brakes.

Imagination only goes so far, help your kids make playtime more believable using these stick sword guards. Available in three distinct colors, they’re made from sturdy silicone with two openings at each end so you can jam an appropriately sized stick right through.

See which companies would prevail if they were pitted against each other by engaging in a rousing game of Web Trumps. Each card comes printed with stats like “year founded”, “homepage size”, and “hipster factor” so you can compete in every category.

Relive the glory days of automotive engineering by riding through the streets behind the wheel of this completely remanufactured DeLorean. It sports a clean stainless steel frame and features the iconic and stylish gull-wing doors that’ll turn heads wherever you go.

Summon the willpower to put your phone down and disconnect from the online world with a helpful reminder from the internet addiction recovery token. The token will help you keep a healthy balance between the real and digital world.

Keep Big Brother from invading your family’s privacy by protecting your home’s airspace with the drone defender rifle. It utilizes radio frequency disruption technology to effectively take down autonomous flying vehicles up to 400 meters away.

Bring new meaning to “frozen” in carbonite by storing all your delicious food and drinks in this Star Wars inspired Han Solo mini fridge. This incredibly geeky refrigerator can hold up to 18 cans – making it perfect for a Star Wars movie marathon!

Make off-road excursions memorable by traversing the wild landscapes behind the wheel of this Legacy Classic Power Wagon. It combines the old world charm of vintage trucks with modern amenities like a 430 hp 426 Hemi V8, a boxed frame, Recaro seats and more.

If you’re searching for the best cuddle buddy in the entire galaxy, this life size BB-8 plushie is definitely the droid you’re looking for. Weighing over five pounds, this two foot tall droid comes filled with soft plastic pellets that make it ideal for hugging or sleeping on.

Craft yourself the perfect timepiece with this open source modular smartwatch. The watch’s band is made up a variety of interchangeable modules such as a battery life extender, GPS, heart rate sensor and many other useful components.

Experience the thrill of being at the helm of a mighty tank by taking command of this 1:16 scale remote controlled Abrams. It replicates authentic details of the U.S. military’s M1A2 Abrams including a turret that rotates 270 degrees.

Douse your enemies with a surprise long range attack using this water balloon slingshot. This multiple person artillery requires two people to hold onto the side handles while you pull on the middle strap to send a water balloon flying distances of nearly 300 feet.

Own a piece of automotive history by adding this fully restored 1967 Ferrari Thomassima II to your collection. One of three iconic rides built by Tom Meade, this elusive piece of automotive history was presumed lost until recently when it hit the market.

Give your board games a cool sci-fi feel by playing them using these futuristic dice. Each piece in the set forgoes the traditional dot design for a sleek space-age facade that’s complemented by an aluminium frame for unmatched durability.

titleEN: Moldable Glow In The Dark Sand
content: Unleash your imagination by creating awesome sculptures that can be appreciated day or night with moldable glow in the dark sand. Using a special formula it acts like wet beach sand so you can mold it how you want without the mess of traditional sand.

Enjoy a sunny day outdoors without burning under the sun by taking shade inside this hanging canopy nest. Available in two sizes and vibrant color combinations, this neat hangout easily installs on any sturdy branch to provide a safe and comfy place to relax.

Experience the best shave of your life by swapping that cheap disposable for the world’s best razor. Engineered to perfection, this heirloom-worthy item features a stainless steel frame and an easy to load blade system for optimal angled exposure.

Relive your glorious childhood all over again by getting behind the wheel of this street legal Little Tikes automobile. The iconic Flintstones-like vehicle we all rode as kids is back, bigger, and faster than ever with enough room to seat two adults.

Give a whole new meaning to wake and bake by starting your day off with a cup of marijuana infused coffee. This potent brew combines the perfect blend of gourmet coffee with high quality cannabis oil to provide a fast acting and energizing high.

Keep your feline friend from interfering with your workflow by protecting your keyboard using this genius cover. It’s translucent and designed to hover over the keyboard so you can use it even if your cat is sitting directing on top.

Cross every destination off your bucket without breaking the bank by traveling using this tricycle camping scooter. It’s small enough to go almost anywhere yet provides enough room to store all the essentials – including a place to sleep.

Get all the perks of a professional camera with the convenience of a smartphone by switching to this multi-aperture computational camera. It packs an array of 16 different camera modules that fire simultaneously to capture multiple fixed focal lengths.

Carry around your <del>rupees, swords, and shields</del> everyday gear in heroic fashion using this Hylian shield backpack. It features a padded back and straps for added comfort and includes a top handle for easy grabbing.

Cook a delicious meal in an eco-friendly manner virtually anywhere using this portable high-power solar BBQ grill. This inflatable and fuel-less barbecue sets up in a snap and is compact enough to fit in a backpack – making it ideal for outdoor excursions.

Get a better understanding of the world around you with the pocket size molecular sensor. It’s a tiny spectrometer that lets you acquire instant relevant information about the chemical make-up of just about anything around you.

Give your brain a real workout by going head to head against your opponent on this speed chess arcade machine. It places a modern spin on the iconic thinking man’s game, allowing you and your opponent to move simultaneously in real time.

The Rezvani Beast Speedster is a track racer’s dream come true. This incredibly light 1650 pound panty dropper features a carbon fiber body and a supercharged 2.4L engine producing 300 HP – allowing it to go from 0-60 in 3.5 seconds!

Transform yourself into one of the most feared creatures in the universe using this Weeping Angel mask. This officially licensed wearable mask comes with mesh over the eye holes so you can clearly see without showing your eyes.

Recharge your batteries by taking an afternoon siesta inside this brilliant nap desk. The moment you begin to feel sluggish while on the job, simply lay out on the lower level of your desk and rest peacefully until you feel rejuvenated enough to resume or the day is over.
